answers.answer: I would ask your obgyn. At 25 weeks it's too soon tell size. Growth rates do slow and speed up. I would get your gestational diabetes test Early. Sometimes bigger babies are link to sugar resistance.
I had the glucose doc says we're good, still worried about a big baby and tearing
It's too early to tell. I wouldn't worry about it too much

question: I'm am 25 weeks along , had another ultrasound last week and doctor said baby was in the 70th percentile.... Does this mean I'm gonna have a huge baby ????? I want a natural birth, but tearing is a scary thought
title: 25 weeks and in 70th percentile? ???
